header.title: Session Action
header.abstract: This document describes the session action.

s1.title: Session Action
s1.p: The session action helps in managing the session of a user on the server. It can create and terminate a session. The function is controlled by a parameter named 'action'.
For more information on session handling and session contexts have a look at the Session Context documentation.
